titleStmt.title: The reformed monastery, or, The love of Jesus a sure and short, pleasant and easie way to heaven : in meditations, directions, and resolutions to love and obey Jesus unto death : in two parts.
titleStmt.author: Beaulieu, Luke, 1644 or 5-1723.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition revised and enlarged.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Beaulieu.
First edition has title: Claustrum animae, the reformed monastery, or, The love of Jesus.
Pt. 2 has separate t.p. and paging.
Reproduction of the original in the Sion College Library, London.
